document_data.name: Haze
document_data.refs1e: {{Cite dragon/61/Now you see them: Cantrips for the aspiring illusionist|7}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Haze''''' was a minor [[illusion]] [[cantrip]] that [[illusionist]]s-in-training could learn.{{Cite dragon/59/Cantrips: Minor magics for would-be wizards|6}} It slightly obscured vision in a small area for a short time.
document_data.Effects: The target of this cantrip had to be within {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} of the caster and the area of effect was a {{SIAdj|10|ft|long=yes}} cube. For one minute, vision in the target area was somewhat impaired as if there were smoke or dust particles drifting in the air. This made it slightly easier to successfully hide in shadows, and any targeted spellcasting or missile launching into, out of, or through the effect of ''haze'' had a marginally smaller chance of success. Likewise, targets of spells or missile attacks had a slightly improved chance to avoid being hit. Rain, a breeze, or a ''[[gust of wind]]'' negated this cantrip.
document_data.Components: This cantrip required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast. The caster waved their hands as if obscuring something while humming a little tune.
